featured.text: Her happy family life led to her excellent performance in school, despite the atmosphere of racial discrimination in the society.
She suffered from severe racial discrimination in her family.
She wanted to fight racial discrimination.
Americans __(38)__ different racial and educational backgrounds may vary in their standards of living.

definition.zh_def: 與種族有關的；涉及不同種族之間的。
definition.en_def: Relating to a person's race or ethnicity.
definition.example: The organization promotes racial equality and justice.
